description:
****Limited Time! 30% off all add-ons!"**** NKJV Bible for iPhone includes the trusted New King James Version of the Bible alongside stunning interactive media including HD videos, high-resolution images, articles, 360-degree virtual tours, and much more. Includes 4 lenses: Bible, Media, Atlas and now the NEW socially-enabled "Me" Lens!

*** Existing Study Bible Users: Download & Log in to get your NKJV or MacArthur Study Bible on this device. ***

TRUSTED TRANSLATION
The NEW KING JAMES VERSION (NKJV) maintains the King James style and accuracy but has up-to-date English. It is the best modern translation for study and is also good for devotional reading. Many excellent study Bibles utilize the NKJV. The translators used the traditionally received texts of the Hebrew, Aramaic, and Greek with textual notes, and followed a literal (word-for-word) translation method.

TONS OF FEATURES
The NKJV for iPhone is powered by award winning Glo Bible technology. Explore the world of the Bible with interactive browsing lenses and Glo media including:
- Full New King James Version (NKJV) Bible Translation
- Offline access to Bible text
- Bible Lens - 2 taps to get to any verse in the New King James Version
- Atlas Lens - zoom into Biblical locations
- "Me" lens to share & explore what friends have posted about the Bible on Facebook or Twitter
- Full-resolution samples of photos, artwork, virtual tours and videos
- "My Notes" and Highlights synchronization across devices
- YouVersion integration to see your public & private notes, community notes and bookmarks
- In-app upgrades to get the NKJV Study Bible, the MacArthur Study Bible & more!

In the zoomable Bible lens it takes just taps 2 taps to access any chapter of the Bible. Each verse is linked to resources and media. The Atlas lens has hundreds of biblical locations linked directly to scripture and media to explore the world of the Bible!

Explore the world of the Bible with NKJV Bible for iPhone!
releaseNotes:
- Improved start-up time
- Fixed Facebook and Twitter authentication issues  
- Bug fix on iPhone to reset the paging when changing Study Note publication
- Bug fix with editing User Note that would not keep line breaks
- Added Descriptions for iPhone Sessions
- iOS 7 compatibility fixes 
- Other bug fixes and improvements
